Pekora is one of the most interesting and entertaining characters in all of Hololive.  Instead of being a standard sweet/cute loli, she's a bratty and mischievous prankster/war criminal who is just as much fun to bully as she is support.  I want to continue to support her as she's truly talented and never fails to make me laugh.

Go watch the archive of her very first streams. Like the super mario maker 2 one that was one of her first (it is still up). She was a totally different character at first lol. She even said when she auditioned she tried to be cutesy and sweet. I'm really happy she found the character she was comfortable with though. We all love her like this.
